output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Explicitly mentions "președintelui Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement with significant reach (1000-1999 impressions)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes Marcel Ciolacu's "plan de țară" - Links it to PSD's governance program - Uses mobilization language ("Mobilizarea este cuvântul la ordinea zilei") - Uses campaign hashtag "#caleasigurapentrubihor"
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No - This is structured campaign messaging with official CMF number

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is paid advertising reaching a wide audience - Has clear electoral messaging - Promotes candidate's platform and plans - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Postarea cu ID 1087041495976896, publicata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, promoveaza explicit "Planul de țară al președintelui Marcel Ciolacu", foloseste numarul CMF 11240017, si are ca scop influentarea intentiei de vot prin prezentarea programului electoral si prin mesaje de mobilizare. Postarea platita pe Facebook si Instagram are un impact semnificativ, atingand intre 1000 si 1999 de persoane, reprezentand astfel o continuare clara a propagandei electorale in afara perioadei permise de lege.
